Filaur of the Grat Pillar Guild:
This if fortuitous timing! Come closer, so that my aging eyes can see you better... ah, yes, I can see that you are an experienced adventurer. I have a task that requires the skills of someone just like you.
Before you embark on it, however, you'll need some things. Let me think... yes, I believe that 20 Bandages, 5 energy Stones and 10 Skeleton Keys should be it. Bring them to me as quickli as you can!
